hadith.chapter: The Book of Faith - كتاب الإيمان
hadith.arabic-text: وحدثنيه إبراهيم بن سعيد الجوهري، حدثنا أبو أسامة، قال حدثني بريد بن عبد الله، بهذا الإسناد قال سئل رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم أى المسلمين أفضل فذكر مثله ‏.‏
hadith.english-text: It is reported on the authority of Anas that the Prophet of Allah (may peace and blessings be upon him ) said: There are three qualities for which anyone who is characterised by them will relish the sweetness of faith: he to whom Allah and His Messenger are dearer than all else; he who loves a man for Allah's sake alone; and he who has as great an abhorrence of returning to unbelief after Allah has rescued him from it as he has of being cast into Hell.
